thread.title: john panagiotidis

author: john panagiotidis
title: john panagiotidis
text: I have Bought the bluboo dual in 18/1/2017,after e-mails they told me that they sent me me the phone in 7/1/2017,i try to communicate with e- mails and facebook messenger and they told me in MESSENGER(facebook)that they shipped 4/2 the order,and they give me a track number(nlpost) that did not work...in there site the order is still prossesing They told me again that the nlpost take 10 days to show your track number That is a lie i have bought to many things from China with NLPOST and the track number after 2 max 3days is detectable!!!BAD STORE,VERY BAD COMMUNICATION(FOLLOW UP)TRAGIC UPDATE STATUS OF THE ORDER!!!!
